2 Points and Length

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Draw > Arc > 2 Points and Length
Shortcut: A, L
Commands: arclength | al

Description:

Draws an arc using the start point, end point and the arc length.

Procedure:

  1. Type the arc length into the options tool bar and choose the arc direction (clockwise or counter-clockwise).
  2. Specify the start point of the arc.
  3. Specify the end point of the arc. If the end point is too far away from the start point for a solution, nothing is drawn.
